name: Injunction to restrain violation
text: [Section effective July 1, 2015.  For section effective until June 30, 2015, see above.]  In addition to the remedies provided in this chapter, the director may apply to the circuit environmental court for a temporary or permanent injunction restraining any person from violating any provision of this chapter. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 2, pt of §2; am L 2014, c 218, §8.]
